tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
quoteText:
You are responsible for safeguarding the password and you agree not to disclose your password to any third party.
You agree that you shall be solely responsible for any activities or actions under your password, whether or not you have authorized such activities or actions.
